Package jbb.engine

Class Summary
Avatar The Abstract Avatar class defines the controllable tile on the board: it is the only one that will be moved.
Board This abstract class contains a two-dimensional array of Tiles, that comprises the playing field of a game, as well as a two-dimensional array that contains the map of set items.
BoardView The BoardView displays a window with the graphical representation of a board.
GameLauncher Asks the user which game he would like to play and then launches it.
Hero Hero is the user controlled character in the game.
Item The Item class consist of an Item that the Avatar can pick up.
NPC The NPC is an Avatar that generally has the primary goal of ruining the life of the hero by attempting to kill it.
Position A Position is a representation of a pair of coordinates on the board.
Tile The Tile class has a position and an image.
Wall The wall is a tile which blocks the path of an Avatar.
 

Exception Summary
GameOver
